message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its potential value, I'm initially proposing a price of $950,000.  I believe this is a fair starting point for us to negotiate a mutually beneficial deal.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. After considering its value, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $750,000.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective on the value, I believe my initial offer was more in line with the true potential of this product.  To move us forward, I'm willing to come down slightly to $900,000.
I've given this some more thought, Alice. Considering the product's potential value, I would like to offer $825,000.
